sen.j: 浄福寺通（じょうふくじどおり）は京都市の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Jofukuji-dori Street is one of the south and north street in Kyoto City.
Jofukuji-dori Street is a street running south-north through Kyoto City.
Jofukuji-dori Street is a street running south-north through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 船岡南通の建勲神社南参道から南へ、盧山寺通と寺之内通でそれぞれ鍵の手に折れて浄福寺門前を南へ竹屋町通まで。
sen.e: This street runs to south from Kenkun Jinja Shrine on Funaokaminami-dori Street, and turns each streets which is Rozanji-dori Street and Teranouchi-dori Street, and goes south at in front of Jofuku-ji Temple to Takeyamachi-dori Street.

This street runs south from Kenkun Jinja Shrine on Funaokaminami-dori Street, and turns at Rozanji-dori Street and Teranouchi-dori Street, heading south from in front of Jofuku-ji Temple to Takeyamachi-dori Street.

This street runs south from Kenkun-jinja Shrine on Funaokaminami-dori Street, and turns at Rozanji-dori Street and Teranouchi-dori Street, heading south from in front of Jofuku-ji Temple to Takeyamachi-dori Street.

sen.j: 南の延長に坊城通がある。
sen.e: There is Bojo-dori Street on a extension at south
Bojo-dori Street is located at the southern extension.
Bojo-dori Street is located at the southern extension.
